text:
@charliekirk11 @KristiNoem This trumpteer sums it up pretty good!
This protest against Gov. Whitmers quarantine (04/15/2020). 
"IF" trump took Real action against COVID19 back in January instead of lying & claiming it's the dems new hoax Maybe we wouldn't be  quarantined & dying!
